name: Poison Oaks: A BXLLET Supplement
description:
Welcome to Poison Oaks, a beacon of the old world in the blasted apocalypse. A town still operating as if the world hadn't ended, the Homeowner's Association makes sure that everyone is happy here. Of course, if the whispers are to be trusted, Poison Oaks might just be the murder capital of the entire world. Find out in this supplement for BXLLET

What's in this:

-A brief setting description

-Tables for buildings and NPCS

-1 class, the Collector, someone who uses Bullets to bring out secrets and find people, whether or not they want to be found. 

Be sure and check out the main game https://rathayibacter.itch.io/bxllet and give them a follow as well!

And, of course, if you like this, check me out on Twitter @Ret0rox

A Note from the Main Game: 

"And a final note. This isn’t a game where the good guys with guns will stop the bad guys with guns, and if you’re still clinging to that fantasy this game isn’t for you. If you’re fascist, racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, ableist, capitalist, conservative, reactionary, or willing to go to bat for any of the scum-sucking pieces of shit listed here, this game isn’t for you either. Get out."
